Posts.Content: Anita, which chemo drugs were recommended to you. It sounds like we have the same types of cancer, etc.  I am stage I, ER/PR+, no node involvement, oncotype test score of 25.  They want me to do cytoxan orally for 26 weeks, and methotrexate intravenously for 26 weeks, followed by radiation and tamoxifen.  Can you tell me how the chemo affected you and what type was used on you?  Thank you!  I need to make decisions fast
Posts.Title: chemo or no chemo?

Posts.Content: Anita, which chemo drugs were recommended to you. It sounds like we have the same types of cancer, etc.  I am stage I, ER/PR+, no node involvement, oncotype test score of 25.  They want me to do cytoxan orally for 26 weeks, and methotrexate intravenously for 26 weeks, followed by radiation and tamoxifen.  Can you tell me how the chemo affected you and what type was used on you?  Thank you!  I need to make decisions fast
Posts.Title: chemo or no chemo?

Posts.Content: I was told that my hair would thin, but I probably wouldn't lose it.  The Cytoxan will be oral, daily, methorexate for 26 weeks.  Does that sound familiar?
Posts.Title: Cytoxan/Methotrexate anyone????

Posts.Content: The doctors told me that this is a lower level chemo treatment.  My hair wouldn't fall out.  I would take cytoxan orally for 26 weeks, then methotrexate and 5FU 1x week for 26 weeks.  They said this works well. My oncotype score is 25.  I am 44 years old.  I had two small tumours side by side 1.2 cm and .8 cm.  The 1.2 cm tumor is the one they tested for oncotype score of 25.  Are you a doctor or nurse?  I truly appreciate your advice. Thank you.
Posts.Title: Cytoxan/Methotrexate anyone????

Posts.Content: I have Stage I Breast cancer. ER/PR+, no node involvement. Had lumpectomy and re-excision surgery.  Oncotype test score of 25.  Now they are recommending cytoxan orally for 26 weeks, and methotrexate intravenously 26 weeks, followed by radiation and tamoxifen.  Has anyone been on cytoxan and methotraxate?  I'd like advice, comments, anything. Thank you.
Posts.Title: Cytoxan/Methotrexate anyone????

Posts.Content: I need to look at my notes regarding HER status, but I think it's not to worry about.  Did you lose hair with the CMF treatment?
